item.description:
Let's get out into nature and ride the scenic trails on horseback.

Bobby's Ranch in Westford has a vast trail system offering scenic views of the woods, rivers and
a pond. They ride through narrow trails and wide open spaces and often see wildlife.

Ever been horseback riding?
Don't worry - they'll offer a variety of experiences if we have a group with different level riders. Beginners will go for a slow guided walk through the trails, and people who have ridden before will have the opportunity to trot and canter if they desire.

Cost: It will be $35 per person for a one hour trail ride

The Plan:
9am - meet in the Boston area (place TBD) to get into a couple vehicles to carpool to Westford. (it's about a 45 minute drive)

10am - arrive at Bobby's Ranch, get an orientation, choose a horse and saddle up.

10:30am - go for a one hour trail ride

11:30am - pack up and find a place to have some lunch on the way back

What to bring:
- Long jeans/pants - NO SHORTS
- A hat
- Sunblock
- Cowboy boots are best, but sneakers are OK

RSVP's
We are limited to 14 people and will need to finalize the Thursday before, so there will be no waiting list.
When you RSVP you'll see a question about whether you're willing to be a driver and how many your car fits. I'll drive one car and I can carry 5 people comfortably in my SUV.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the Boston area and then carpool.
item.name: Horseback Riding at Bobby's Ranch in Westford
